tool_description: Provides historical, cultural, and geographical context for scriptural passages to enhance understanding of the original setting and circumstances.

reference.description: Scripture reference to provide context for

error_messages: Invalid scripture reference: Provide a recognized biblical reference format.
Unsupported context type: Valid types are [historical, cultural, geographical, political, religious].
No context available: Historical context not available for the specified reference.
Invalid time period: Specified time period not recognized or relevant.
usage: Specify a scripture reference and desired context types. Returns comprehensive historical, cultural, and geographical information relevant to understanding the passage.

cultural_context.description: Cultural practices and beliefs of the time period

contemporary_events.description: Significant events occurring during the same time period
